section.title: NAME
section.simpara: odgi_pathindex - create a path index for a given path

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.simpara: The odgi pathindex(1) command generates a path index of a graph. It uses succinct data structures to encode the index. The path index represents a subset of the features of a fully realized xg index. Having a path index, we can use odgi panpos to go from path:position → pangenome:position which is important when navigating large graphs in an interactive manner like in the Pantograph project.

listitem.simpara: File containing the succinct variation graph to generate a path index from. The file name usually ends with .og.
Write the path index to FILE.
Print a help message for odgi pathindex.
Failure (syntax or usage error; parameter error; file processing failure; unexpected error).
